channel.title: Client.jar into my website
channel.description:
Hello ,
I've uploaded the client to my site and i putted to code for it in the php document : www.deathx-clan.com/client.php
But it shows an red X
Can anyone help me ?

item.title: Client.jar into my website
item.dc:creator: @Dave007 Dave007
item.description:
@Dave007 wrote:

[quote=“MasterHelper, post:2, topic:176165”]Well, first of all… You need to upload signed_client.jar in an ftp manager. and then find the link to that ex: www.your-website/signed_client.jar. then make an html file and put the code in it but where it says archive= put the url to your signed_client.jar link…

Hope i helped :)[/quote]

I’ve uploaded client.jar in my ftp

[hr]

I still need help …

Read full topic

item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

i could do html format if you want that instead?

item.title: Client.jar into my website
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

Well, first of all… You need to upload signed_client.jar in an ftp manager. and then find the link to that ex: www.your-website/signed_client.jar. then make an html file and put the code in it but where it says archive= put the url to your signed_client.jar link…

Hope i helped

Read full topic
